page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: {Market Bosworth,Barlestone and {______________________________ { Osbastone { _________ This is a rural area of West Leicestershire where agriculture is still the main economic activity. The two largest settlements are the village of Barlestone and market town of Market Bosworth.The area has historical associations with the area being close to the Wars of the Roses final battle,and with the activities of the local "landed gentry". At the time of writing the area is still one of relative prosperity with a range of small businesses providing local employment and revenue.With improved road transport a feature of this area,many local people commute to work in the nearby centres of
